name: Foolf
description:
This game was created by 4 peoples on a little private Game Jam from Technocite.

We have dispensed of +/- 15hours to develop this game.

Constraint were:
- Not 2d artist on our team
- Only on discord ==> Distance and Covid confinement
- Theme : Golf 2D / What the Golf
- 2d game

Team members :
Annie Warenghien : LinkedIn
Ennio Dal Farra : Portfolio
Selim Grote : Facebook
Yohan Debusscher : LinkedIn

==================== HOW TO PLAY ====================
Step 1 :
Launch the game on your browser on clicking : Run the game

Step 2 :
Click on full size screen button

Step 3 :
Let's go to see the "credit page" for seeing our team

Step 4 :
Click on New Game button

Step 5 :
The game begin ! Use your mouse with left click for prepare the shoot. Slide with this, and see the Power Meter with the direction followed by the ball. Release the left click. ENJOY !

NB : Our game is on FHD resolution ( 1920x1080 ). You could have some problem with an other resolution. We're sorry, but this is just a prototype.

We don't continue this game. It was created just for the gamejam :).

Thanks you for playing. And take fun !
Don't forgot to let us a comment ! :D
